mcq.statement: Choose the correct sentence from the following sentences? The problems calls into about the same diagnostic ability as the physician's

options.a: The problems calls into about the same diagnostic ability as the physician's
options.b: The problems calls on about the same diagnostic ability as the physician's
options.c: The problems calls at about the same diagnostic ability as the physician's
options.d: The problems calls for about the same diagnostic ability as the physician's
